metadata.title: CVE-2024-57907 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adc: rockchip_saradc: fix information leak in triggered bufferThe 'data' local struct is used to push data to user space from atriggered buffer, but it does not set values for inactive channels, asit only uses iio_for_each_active_channel() to assign new values.Initialize the struct to zero before using it to avoid pushinguninitialized information to userspace.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of ESM support').
